alert.note: Alert for Saratoga; Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 11:55AM EST until December 21 at 9:24AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at Fort Edward. * WHEN...From this evening to late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, water reaches Route 9N in Corinth, floods cellars in Corinth and reaches first floors along Old Bend Road in Moreau. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 22.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 28.3 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Fort Edward Flood Stage: 26.0 Observed Stage at Mon 10 am: 22.8 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 23.6 Mon 7 pm 25.4 Tue 1 am 27.1 Tue 7 am 27.9 Tue 1 pm 28.2 Tue 7 pm 28.3 Wed 1 am 28.1 Wed 7 am 27.7 Wed 1 pm 27.2 Wed 7 pm 26.7 Thu 1 am 26.2 Thu 7 am 25.7 &&
